articles.description: Australia's injury concerns continue to mount ahead of the first Test against India with key pacer Josh Hazlewood ruled out of the opening match in Nagpur.
articles.content: Australia's injury concerns continue to mount ahead of the first Test against India with key pacer Josh Hazlewood ruled out of the opening match in Nagpur.Hazelwood has been battling an Achilles prob… [+2724 chars]

articles.title: 'India Will Win'-Staunch Critic Gives Predictions Ahead of Border Gavaskar Trophy - News18
articles.description: India will be up against Australia in the opening Test match of the Border Gavaskar Trophy in Nagpur. Ahead of the series opener former England skipper gave out his predictions.
articles.content: Former England captain Michael Vaughan has tipped hosts India to beat Australia in the Border Gavaskar Trophy which begins on February 9. Vaughan, who had been a dire critic of the Indian team, of la… [+2092 chars]

articles.title: Ex-India star reveals why Dhoni picked Sehwag to open in bowl-out vs Pakistan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The result of the tied T20 World Cup match between India and Pakistan was ascertained by a bowl-out, and Virender Sehwag was picked as India's first bowler in the lineup. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India created history in 2007 when it lifted the inaugural T20 World Cup trophy under the captaincy of a young Mahendra Singh Dhoni. It was the former wicketkeeper-batter's first assignment as s… [+2040 chars]
